Class FrameScaler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.libav.video.FrameScaler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFrameConsumer, IFrameProducer

    public class FrameScaler
extends Object
implements IFrameConsumer, IFrameProducer
    Native vide frame scaler.
    Author:
    Ondrej Perutka

    • Constructor Detail

      • FrameScaler

        public FrameScaler(int srcWidth,
           int srcHeight,
           int srcPixelFormat,
           int dstWidth,
           int dstHeight,
           int dstPixelFormat)
            throws LibavException
        Create a new video frame scaler and set scaling parameters.
        Parameters:
        srcWidth - a width of source images
        srcHeight - a height of source images
        srcFormat - a pixel format of source images
        dstWidth - a width of produced images
        dstHeight - a height of produced images
        dstPixelFormat - a pixel format of produced images
        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs

      • processFrame

        public void processFrame(Object producer,
                IFrameWrapper frame)
                  throws LibavException
        Description copied from interface: IFrameConsumer
        This method will be called by a frame decoder. It delivers audio/video frames.
        Specified by:
        processFrame in interface IFrameConsumer
        Parameters:
        producer - a video frame producer responsible for calling this method and producing the video frame
        frame - a video frame
        Throws:
        LibavException - you may want to throw this type of exception if you call some Libav function inside this method
